## gtsummary [![](reference/figures/logo.png)](https://github.com/ddsjoberg/gtsummary)

The {gtsummary} package provides an elegant and flexible way to create
publication-ready analytical and summary tables using the **R**
programming language. The {gtsummary} package summarizes data sets,
regression models, and more, using sensible defaults with highly
customizable capabilities.

- [**Summarize data frames or
  tibbles**](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/tbl_summary.html)
  easily in **R**. Perfect for presenting descriptive statistics,
  comparing group **demographics** (e.g creating a **Table 1** for
  medical journals), and more. Automatically detects continuous,
  categorical, and dichotomous variables in your data set, calculates
  appropriate descriptive statistics, and also includes amount of
  missingness in each variable.

- [**Summarize regression
  models**](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/tbl_regression.html)
  in R and include reference rows for categorical variables. Common
  regression models, such as logistic regression and Cox proportional
  hazards regression, are automatically identified and the tables are
  pre-filled with appropriate column headers (i.e. Odds Ratio and Hazard
  Ratio).

- [**Customize gtsummary
  tables**](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/index.html#section-general-formatting-styling-functions)
  using a growing list of formatting/styling functions.
  **[Bold](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/bold_italicize_labels_levels.html)**
  labels,
  **[italicize](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/bold_italicize_labels_levels.html)**
  levels, **[add
  p-value](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/add_p.html)**
  to summary tables,
  **[style](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/style_percent.html)**
  the statistics however you choose,
  **[merge](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/tbl_merge.html)**
  or
  **[stack](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/tbl_stack.html)**
  tables to present results side by side… there are so many
  possibilities to create the table of your dreams!

- **[Report statistics
  inline](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/inline_text.html)**
  from summary tables and regression summary tables in **R markdown**.
  Make your reports completely reproducible!

By leveraging [{broom}](https://broom.tidymodels.org/),
[{gt}](https://gt.rstudio.com/), and
[{labelled}](http://larmarange.github.io/labelled/) packages,
{gtsummary} creates beautifully formatted, ready-to-share summary and
result tables in a single line of R code!

Check out the examples below, review the
[vignettes](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/) for a
detailed exploration of the output options, and view the
[gallery](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/gallery.html)
for various customization examples.

## Installation

The {gtsummary} package was written as a companion to the
[{gt}](https://gt.rstudio.com/) package from RStudio. You can install
{gtsummary} with the following code.

``` r
install.packages("gtsummary")
```

Install the development version with
`pak::pkg_install("ddsjoberg/gtsummary", dependencies = TRUE)`

## Examples

### Summary Table

Use
[`tbl_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/tbl_summary.html)
to summarize a data frame.

![animated](https://github.com/ddsjoberg/gtsummary/raw/main/data-raw/misc_files/tbl_summary_demo1.gif)

Example basic table:

``` r
library(gtsummary)

# summarize the data with our package
table1 <-
  trial |> 
  tbl_summary(include = c(age, grade, response))
```

![](reference/figures/README-tbl_summary_print_simple-1.png)

There are many **customization options** to **add information** (like
comparing groups) and **format results** (like bold labels) in your
table. See the
[`tbl_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/tbl_summary.html)
tutorial for many more options, or below for one example.

``` r
table2 <-
  tbl_summary(
    trial,
    include = c(age, grade, response),
    by = trt, # split table by group
    missing = "no" # don't list missing data separately
  ) |> 
  add_n() |> # add column with total number of non-missing observations
  add_p() |> # test for a difference between groups
  modify_header(label = "**Variable**") |> # update the column header
  bold_labels()
```

![](reference/figures/README-tbl_summary_print_extra-1.png)

### Regression Models

Use
[`tbl_regression()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/reference/tbl_regression.html)
to easily and beautifully display regression model results in a table.
See the
[tutorial](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/tbl_regression.html)
for customization options.

``` r
mod1 <- glm(response ~ trt + age + grade, trial, family = binomial)

t1 <- tbl_regression(mod1, exponentiate = TRUE)
```

![](reference/figures/README-tbl_regression_printa-1.png)

### Side-by-side Regression Models

You can also present side-by-side regression model results using
[`tbl_merge()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_merge.md)

``` r
library(survival)

# build survival model table
t2 <-
  coxph(Surv(ttdeath, death) ~ trt + grade + age, trial) |> 
  tbl_regression(exponentiate = TRUE)

# merge tables
tbl_merge_ex1 <-
  tbl_merge(
    tbls = list(t1, t2),
    tab_spanner = c("**Tumor Response**", "**Time to Death**")
  )
```

![](reference/figures/README-tbl_merge_ex1-1.png)

Review even more output options in the **[table
gallery](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/gallery.html)**.

## gtsummary + R Markdown

The **{gtsummary}** package was written to be a companion to the
**{gt}** package from RStudio. But not all output types are supported by
the **{gt}** package. Therefore, we have made it possible to print
**{gtsummary}** tables with various engines.

Review the **[gtsummary + R
Markdown](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/rmarkdown.html)**
vignette for details.

[![](reference/figures/gt_output_formats.PNG)](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/rmarkdown.html)

## Save Individual Tables

{gtsummary} tables can also be saved directly to file as an image, HTML,
Word, RTF, and LaTeX file.

``` r
tbl |> 
  as_gt() |> 
  gt::gtsave(filename = ".") # use extensions .png, .html, .docx, .rtf, .tex, .ltx
```

## Additional Resources

- The best resources are the gtsummary vignettes: [table
  gallery](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/gallery.html),
  [`tbl_summary()`
  tutorial](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/tbl_summary.html),
  [`tbl_regression()`
  tutorial](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/tbl_regression.html),
  [`inline_text()`
  tutorial](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/inline_text.html),
  [gtsummary
  themes](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/themes.html),
  [gtsummary+R
  markdown](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/articles/rmarkdown.html).

- The R Journal Article [*Reproducible Summary Tables with the gtsummary
  Package*](https://github.com/ddsjoberg/gtsummary/raw/main/data-raw/RJ-2021-053.pdf).

- The [RStudio Education
  Blog](https://education.rstudio.com/blog/2020/07/gtsummary/) includes
  a post with a brief introduction to the package.

- A [recording of a
  presentation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tANo9E1SYJE) given to
  the Weill Cornell Biostatistics Department and the Memorial Sloan
  Kettering R Users Group.

## Cite gtsummary

``` text
> citation("gtsummary")

To cite gtsummary in publications use:

  Sjoberg DD, Whiting K, Curry M, Lavery JA, Larmarange J. Reproducible summary tables with the gtsummary package.
  The R Journal 2021;13:570–80. https://doi.org/10.32614/RJ-2021-053.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is

  @Article{gtsummary,
    author = {Daniel D. Sjoberg and Karissa Whiting and Michael Curry and Jessica A. Lavery and Joseph Larmarange},
    title = {Reproducible Summary Tables with the gtsummary Package},
    journal = {{The R Journal}},
    year = {2021},
    url = {https://doi.org/10.32614/RJ-2021-053},
    doi = {10.32614/RJ-2021-053},
    volume = {13},
    issue = {1},
    pages = {570-580},
  }
```

## Contributing

Big thank you to `@jeffreybears` for the hex sticker!

Please note that the {gtsummary} project is released with a [Contributor
Code of
Conduct](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.html).
By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms. Thank
you to all contributors!

# Package index

## Data Summary Tables

### Standard Summary Tables

- [`tbl_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_summary.md)
  : Summary table
- [`add_p(`*`<tbl_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_p.tbl_summary.md)
  : Add p-values
- [`add_q()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_q.md)
  : Add multiple comparison adjustment
- [`add_overall()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_overall.md)
  : Add overall column
- [`add_difference(`*`<tbl_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_difference.tbl_summary.md)
  : Add differences between groups
- [`add_difference_row(`*`<tbl_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_difference_row.tbl_summary.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Add differences rows between groups
- [`add_n(`*`<tbl_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  [`add_n(`*`<tbl_svysummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  [`add_n(`*`<tbl_likert>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  : Add column with N
- [`add_ci()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_ci.md)
  : Add CI Column
- [`add_stat_label()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_stat_label.md)
  **\[questioning\]** : Add statistic labels
- [`add_stat()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_stat.md)
  : Add a custom statistic
- [`add_variable_group_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_variable_group_header.md)
  : Variable Group Header
- [`separate_p_footnotes()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/separate_p_footnotes.md)
  **\[questioning\]** : Create footnotes for individual p-values

### Cross Tables

- [`tbl_cross()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_cross.md)
  : Cross table
- [`add_p(`*`<tbl_cross>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_p.tbl_cross.md)
  : Add p-value

### Continuous Variable Summary

- [`tbl_continuous()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_continuous.md)
  : Summarize continuous variable
- [`add_overall()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_overall.md)
  : Add overall column
- [`add_p(`*`<tbl_continuous>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_p.tbl_continuous.md)
  : Add p-values
- [`add_stat()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_stat.md)
  : Add a custom statistic

### Wide Summary Tables

- [`tbl_wide_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_wide_summary.md)
  : Wide summary table

### Hierarchical Summary Tables

- [`tbl_hierarchical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_hierarchical.md)
  [`tbl_hierarchical_count()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_hierarchical.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Hierarchical Table
- [`sort_hierarchical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/sort_hierarchical.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Sort Hierarchical Tables
- [`filter_hierarchical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/filter_hierarchical.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Filter Hierarchical Tables
- [`add_overall()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_overall.md)
  : Add overall column

### Likert Summary Tables

- [`tbl_likert()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_likert.md)
  : Likert Summary
- [`add_n(`*`<tbl_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  [`add_n(`*`<tbl_svysummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  [`add_n(`*`<tbl_likert>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  : Add column with N

### Time-to-event Summary Tables

- [`tbl_survfit()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_survfit.md)
  : Survival table
- [`add_p(`*`<tbl_survfit>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_p.tbl_survfit.md)
  : Add p-value
- [`add_n(`*`<tbl_survfit>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n.tbl_survfit.md)
  : Add N
- [`add_nevent(`*`<tbl_survfit>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_nevent.tbl_survfit.md)
  : Add event N
- [`add_q()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_q.md)
  : Add multiple comparison adjustment

### Survey Design Summary Tables

- [`tbl_svysummary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_svysummary.md)
  : Create a table of summary statistics from a survey object
- [`add_p(`*`<tbl_svysummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_p.tbl_svysummary.md)
  : Add p-values
- [`add_q()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_q.md)
  : Add multiple comparison adjustment
- [`add_overall()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_overall.md)
  : Add overall column
- [`add_difference(`*`<tbl_svysummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_difference.tbl_svysummary.md)
  : Add differences between groups
- [`add_ci(`*`<tbl_svysummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_ci.tbl_svysummary.md)
  : Add CI Column
- [`add_n(`*`<tbl_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  [`add_n(`*`<tbl_svysummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  [`add_n(`*`<tbl_likert>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_summary.md)
  : Add column with N
- [`add_stat_label()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_stat_label.md)
  **\[questioning\]** : Add statistic labels
- [`add_stat()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_stat.md)
  : Add a custom statistic
- [`separate_p_footnotes()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/separate_p_footnotes.md)
  **\[questioning\]** : Create footnotes for individual p-values

### Custom Summary Tables

- [`tbl_custom_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_custom_summary.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Create a table of summary statistics using a
  custom summary function
- [`add_overall()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_overall.md)
  : Add overall column
- [`proportion_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/proportion_summary.md)
  : Summarize a proportion
- [`ratio_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/ratio_summary.md)
  : Summarize the ratio of two variables

## Regression Model Summary Tables

- [`tbl_regression()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_regression.md)
  : Regression model summary
- [`tbl_uvregression()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_uvregression.md)
  : Univariable regression model summary
- [`add_global_p()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_global_p.md)
  : Add the global p-values
- [`add_n(`*`<tbl_regression>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_regression.md)
  [`add_n(`*`<tbl_uvregression>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_n_regression.md)
  : Add N to regression table
- [`add_nevent()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_nevent_regression.md)
  : Add event N
- [`combine_terms()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/combine_terms.md)
  : Combine terms
- [`add_glance_table()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_glance.md)
  [`add_glance_source_note()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_glance.md)
  : Add model statistics
- [`add_q()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_q.md)
  : Add multiple comparison adjustment
- [`add_significance_stars()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_significance_stars.md)
  : Add significance stars
- [`add_vif()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_vif.md)
  : Add Variance Inflation Factor
- [`plot(`*`<tbl_regression>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/plot.md)
  [`plot(`*`<tbl_uvregression>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/plot.md)
  : Plot Regression Coefficients

## Inline Reporting

- [`inline_text(`*`<tbl_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.tbl_summary.md)
  [`inline_text(`*`<tbl_svysummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.tbl_summary.md)
  : Report statistics from summary tables inline
- [`inline_text(`*`<tbl_regression>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.tbl_regression.md)
  : Report statistics from regression summary tables inline
- [`inline_text(`*`<tbl_uvregression>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.tbl_uvregression.md)
  : Report statistics from regression summary tables inline
- [`inline_text(`*`<tbl_survfit>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.tbl_survfit.md)
  : Report statistics from survfit tables inline
- [`inline_text(`*`<tbl_cross>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.tbl_cross.md)
  : Report statistics from cross table inline
- [`inline_text(`*`<tbl_continuous>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.tbl_continuous.md)
  : Report statistics from summary tables inline
- [`inline_text(`*`<gtsummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/inline_text.gtsummary.md)
  : Report statistics from summary tables inline

## Output Types

- [`as_gt()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_gt.md)
  : Convert gtsummary object to gt
- [`as_flex_table()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_flex_table.md)
  : Convert gtsummary object to a flextable object
- [`as_kable()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_kable.md)
  : Convert gtsummary object to a kable object
- [`as_kable_extra()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_kable_extra.md)
  : Convert gtsummary object to a kableExtra object
- [`as_hux_table()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_hux_table.md)
  [`as_hux_xlsx()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_hux_table.md)
  : Convert gtsummary object to a huxtable object
- [`as_tibble(`*`<gtsummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_tibble.gtsummary.md)
  [`as.data.frame(`*`<gtsummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_tibble.gtsummary.md)
  : Convert gtsummary object to a tibble

## Other Functions

### Head or Tail Tables

- [`head(`*`<gtsummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/head.gtsummary.md)
  [`tail(`*`<gtsummary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/head.gtsummary.md)
  : Display the first or last rows

### Merge, Stack, Stratify, or Split Summary Tables

- [`tbl_merge()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_merge.md)
  : Merge tables
- [`tbl_stack()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_stack.md)
  : Stack tables
- [`tbl_strata()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_strata.md)
  [`tbl_strata2()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_strata.md)
  : Stratified gtsummary tables
- [`tbl_strata_nested_stack()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_strata_nested_stack.md)
  : Stratified Nested Stacking
- [`tbl_split_by_rows()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_split_by.md)
  [`tbl_split_by_columns()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_split_by.md)
  [`print(`*`<tbl_split>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_split_by.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Split gtsummary table by rows and/or columns
- [`tbl_butcher()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_butcher.md)
  : Butcher table

### Style Summary Tables

- [`modify_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify.md)
  [`modify_spanning_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify.md)
  [`remove_spanning_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify.md)
  [`show_header_names()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify.md)
  : Modify column headers and spanning headers
- [`modify_footnote_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_footnote2.md)
  [`modify_footnote_body()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_footnote2.md)
  [`modify_footnote_spanning_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_footnote2.md)
  [`remove_footnote_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_footnote2.md)
  [`remove_footnote_body()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_footnote2.md)
  [`remove_footnote_spanning_header()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_footnote2.md)
  : Modify Footnotes
- [`modify_source_note()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_source_note.md)
  [`remove_source_note()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_source_note.md)
  : Modify source note
- [`modify_abbreviation()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_abbreviation.md)
  [`remove_abbreviation()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_abbreviation.md)
  : Modify Abbreviations
- [`modify_caption()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/modify_caption.md)
  : Modify table caption
- [`bold_labels()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/bold_italicize_labels_levels.md)
  [`italicize_labels()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/bold_italicize_labels_levels.md)
  [`bold_levels()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/bold_italicize_labels_levels.md)
  [`italicize_levels()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/bold_italicize_labels_levels.md)
  : Bold or Italicize
- [`bold_p()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/bold_p.md)
  : Bold significant p-values
- [`sort_p()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/sort_filter_p.md)
  [`filter_p()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/sort_filter_p.md)
  : Sort/filter by p-values
- [`remove_row_type()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/remove_row_type.md)
  : Remove rows

### Style/Format Numeric Vectors

- [`style_percent()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/style_percent.md)
  : Style percentages
- [`style_pvalue()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/style_pvalue.md)
  : Style p-values
- [`style_sigfig()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/style_sigfig.md)
  : Style significant figure-like rounding
- [`style_ratio()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/style_ratio.md)
  : Style ratios
- [`style_number()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/style_number.md)
  : Style numbers
- [`label_style_number()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/label_style.md)

  [`label_style_pvalue()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/label_style.md)

  [`label_style_percent()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/label_style.md)
  : Style Functions

### ARD Constructors

- [`tbl_ard_continuous()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_ard_continuous.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Summarize continuous variable
- [`tbl_ard_hierarchical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_ard_hierarchical.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : ARD Hierarchical Table
- [`tbl_ard_strata()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_ard_strata.md)
  [`tbl_ard_strata2()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_ard_strata.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Stratified gtsummary tables from ARD
- [`tbl_ard_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_ard_summary.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : ARD summary table
- [`tbl_ard_wide_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/tbl_ard_wide_summary.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Wide ARD summary table
- [`add_overall(`*`<tbl_ard_summary>`*`)`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_overall_ard.md)
  : ARD add overall column
- [`add_stat_label()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/add_stat_label.md)
  **\[questioning\]** : Add statistic labels
- [`filter_hierarchical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/filter_hierarchical.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Filter Hierarchical Tables
- [`sort_hierarchical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/sort_hierarchical.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Sort Hierarchical Tables
- [`gather_ard()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/gather_ard.md)
  : Extract ARDs

### Construction Helpers

- [`as_gtsummary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/as_gtsummary.md)
  : Create gtsummary table

  [`pier_summary_hierarchical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_hierarchical.md)
  : Hierarchy table bridge
- [`brdg_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_summary.md)
  [`pier_summary_dichotomous()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_summary.md)
  [`pier_summary_categorical()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_summary.md)
  [`pier_summary_continuous2()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_summary.md)
  [`pier_summary_continuous()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_summary.md)
  [`pier_summary_missing_row()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_summary.md)
  : Summary table bridge
- [`brdg_wide_summary()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/brdg_wide_summary.md)
  : Wide summary table bridge
- [`assign_summary_digits()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/assign_summary_digits.md)
  : Assign Default Digits
- [`assign_summary_type()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/assign_summary_type.md)
  : Assign Default Summary Type
- [`assign_tests()`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/assign_tests.md)
  : Assign Test

### Data

- [`trial`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/dev/reference/trial.md)
  : Results from a simulated study of two chemotherapy agents
